nodes.text: Lemonade was a drink. It was consumed during the duel between Darth Maul and Qui-Gon Jinn. The two sat down to consume it before continuing their fight. At that time, it was stored in a clear pitcher. Lemonade was potable by Zabraks and Humans, as Darth Maul and Qui-Gon Jinn consumed it.
Lemonade first appeared in the 2011 young-readers book, LEGO Star Wars: Darth Maul's Mission, a humorous re-imagining of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace using LEGO figures.
